name: Future Pinball
description: Future Pinball is a free pinball construction program supporting OpenGL for the 3D graphics, Visual Basic for the table logic and Newton Game Dynamics for physics. The included editor can create, load or play tables. When playing, the table and its arcade environment are rendered in full 3D, with the possibility of switching between several views with the functions keys. The graphics engine is scalable, supporting a broad range of old and new hardware. Several custom tables created by users are available to download on internet.
